sentences.zh: 太史公讀秦楚之際，曰：初作難，發於陳涉；

translations.text: When Sima Qian read about the Qin-Chu period, he said: The initial uprising began with Chen She;
Tyrannical cruelty destroyed Qin, arose from the Xiang clan;

sentences.zh: 撥亂誅暴，平定海內，卒踐帝祚，成於漢家。

translations.text: Eliminated chaos and executed tyrants, pacified the realm, finally ascended the imperial throne, accomplished by the Han house.
Within five years, commands and decrees changed three times.

sentences.zh: 自生民以來，未始有受命若斯之亟

translations.text: Since the beginning of human life, never has the reception of the mandate been so urgent as this

When Sima Qian read about the Qin-Chu period, he said: The initial uprising began with Chen She; Tyrannical cruelty destroyed Qin, arose from the Xiang clan; Eliminated chaos and executed tyrants, pacified the realm, finally ascended the imperial throne, accomplished by the Han house. Within five years, commands and decrees changed three times. Since the beginning of human life, never has the reception of the mandate been so urgent as this

sentences.zh: 昔虞、夏之興，積善累功數十年，德洽百姓，攝行政事，考之于天，然後在位。

translations.text: In ancient times, when Yu and Xia rose to power, they accumulated goodness and achievements for several decades, their virtue permeated the people, they administered government affairs, tested it with Heaven, and then took the throne.

sentences.zh: 湯、武之王，乃由契、后稷修仁行義十餘世，不期而會孟津八百諸侯，猶以為未可，其后乃放弒。

translations.text: When Tang and Wu became kings, it was through Jie and Houji cultivating benevolence and righteousness for more than ten generations, unexpectedly gathering at Mengjin with eight hundred feudal lords, yet they still considered it not yet possible, and only afterward did they banish and assassinate.

sentences.zh: 秦起襄公，章於文、繆，獻、孝之後，稍以蠶食六國，百有餘載，至始皇乃能并冠帶之倫。

translations.text: Qin arose with Duke Xiang, flourished under Wen and Mu, after Xian and Xiao, gradually encroaching on the six states like silkworms eating mulberry leaves, for more than a hundred years, until the First Emperor was able to unite those who wore caps and belts.

sentences.zh: 以德若彼，用力如此，蓋一統若斯之難也。

translations.text: With virtue like that, using force like this, indeed unifying is as difficult as this.

In ancient times, when Yu and Xia rose to power, they accumulated goodness and achievements for several decades, their virtue permeated the people, they administered government affairs, tested it with Heaven, and then took the throne. When Tang and Wu became kings, it was through Jie and Houji cultivating benevolence and righteousness for more than ten generations, unexpectedly gathering at Mengjin with eight hundred feudal lords, yet they still considered it not yet possible, and only afterward did they banish and assassinate. Qin arose with Duke Xiang, flourished under Wen and Mu, after Xian and Xiao, gradually encroaching on the six states like silkworms eating mulberry leaves, for more than a hundred years, until the First Emperor was able to unite those who wore caps and belts. With virtue like that, using force like this, indeed unifying is as difficult as this.

sentences.zh: 秦既稱帝，患兵革不休，以有諸侯也，於是無尺土之封，墮壞名城，銷鋒鏑，鉏豪桀，維萬世之安。

translations.text: After Qin declared itself emperor, it worried that weapons would never cease because of the feudal lords, therefore there were no enfeoffments of even a foot of land, famous cities were demolished, weapons were melted down, powerful nobles were eliminated, to maintain peace for ten thousand generations.

sentences.zh: 然王跡之興，起於閭巷，合從討伐，軼於三代，鄉秦之禁，適足以資賢者為驅除難耳。

translations.text: Yet the rise of royal traces begins in alleyways, allied coalitions attack, surpassing the Three Dynasties, the Qin prohibitions actually only served to provide resources for the worthy to eliminate difficulties.

sentences.zh: 故憤發其所為天下雄，安在無土不王。

translations.text: Therefore they were enraged at what made them hegemon of the realm, how could they not become king without territory?
Is this not what the transmissions call a great sage?
Is it not Heaven? Is it not Heaven!

sentences.zh: 非大聖孰能當此受命而帝者乎？

translations.text: Who but a great sage could receive this mandate and become emperor?

After Qin declared itself emperor, it worried that weapons would never cease because of the feudal lords, therefore there were no enfeoffments of even a foot of land, famous cities were demolished, weapons were melted down, powerful nobles were eliminated, to maintain peace for ten thousand generations. Yet the rise of royal traces begins in alleyways, allied coalitions attack, surpassing the Three Dynasties, the Qin prohibitions actually only served to provide resources for the worthy to eliminate difficulties. Therefore they were enraged at what made them hegemon of the realm, how could they not become king without territory? Is this not what the transmissions call a great sage? Is it not Heaven? Is it not Heaven! Who but a great sage could receive this mandate and become emperor?

cells.translation: Second Emperor first year
Seventh month
Chu Yin Wang Chen She raised troops and entered Qin.
Eighth month

cells.content: 二。葛嬰為涉徇九江，立襄彊為楚王。
cells.translation: Second. Ge Ying acted for She in Jiujiang, established Xiang Qiang as Chu king.

cells.content: 武臣始至邯鄲，自立為趙王，始。
cells.translation: Wu Chen first arrived at Handan, established himself as Zhao king, beginning.
Ninth month. Chu troops arrived at Xi.

cells.content: 三。周文兵至戲，敗。而葛嬰聞涉王，即殺彊。
cells.translation: Third. Zhou Wen's troops arrived at Xi, were defeated. Ge Ying heard that She was king, immediately killed Qiang.
Xiang Liang styled himself Wu Xin Jun.
Second

cells.content: 齊王田儋始。儋，狄人。諸田宗彊。從弟榮，榮弟橫。
cells.translation: Qi King Tian Dan beginning. Dan was a Di person. Various Tian clan relatives were strong. Younger cousin Rong, Rong's younger brother Heng.
Pei Gong first rose.

cells.content: 韓廣為趙略地至薊，自立為燕王始。
cells.translation: Han Guang conquered territory for Zhao to Ji, established himself as Yan king beginning.

cells.content: 魏王咎始。咎在陳，不得歸國。
cells.translation: Wei King Jiu beginning. Jiu was in Chen, could not return to his state.
Second year tenth month
Fourth. Executed Ge Ying.
Second
Third
Second. When Dan rose, he killed the Di magistrate and made himself king.

cells.content: 二。擊胡陵、方與，破秦監軍。
cells.translation: Second. Attacked Hu Ling and Fang Yu, defeated Qin's army supervisor.
Second
Second
Eleventh month
Fifth. Zhou Wen died.
Third

cells.content: 四。李良殺武臣，張耳、陳餘走。
cells.translation: Fourth. Li Liang killed Wu Chen, Zhang Er and Chen Yu fled.
Third

cells.content: 三。殺泗水守。拔薛西。周市東略地豐沛閒。
cells.translation: Third. Killed the Si River guard. Took west of Xue. Zhou Shi conquered east to Feng Pei area.
Third

cells.content: 三。齊、趙共立周市，市不肯，曰「必立魏咎」云。
cells.translation: Third. Qi and Zhao together established Zhou Shi, Shi refused, said 'Must establish Wei Jiu' etc.
Twelfth month
Sixth. Chen She died.
Fourth
Fourth

cells.content: 四。雍齒叛沛公，以豐降魏。沛公還攻豐，不能下。
cells.translation: Fourth. Yong Chi rebelled against Pei Gong, surrendered Feng to Wei. Pei Gong returned and attacked Feng, could not take it.
Fourth
Fourth. Jiu returned from Chen, was established.
First month
Chu King Jing Ju beginning, Qin Jia established him.

cells.content: 五。涉將召平矯拜項梁為楚柱國，急西擊秦。
cells.translation: Fifth. She's general Zhao Ping falsely appointed Xiang Liang as Chu Zhu Guo, urgently attacked west against Qin.

cells.content: 趙王歇始，張耳、陳餘立之。
cells.translation: Zhao King Xie beginning, Zhang Er and Chen Yu established him.

cells.content: 五。讓景駒以擅自王不請我。
cells.translation: Fifth. Reprimanded Jing Ju for presumptuously becoming king without consulting us.

cells.content: 五。沛公聞景駒王在留，往從，與擊秦軍碭西。
cells.translation: Fifth. Pei Gong heard Jing Ju was king at Liu, went to follow him, together attacked Qin army west of Dang.
五

cells.content: 五。章邯已破涉，圍咎臨濟。
cells.translation: 五。章邯已破涉，圍咎臨濟。
二月
二。嘉為上將軍。

cells.content: 六。梁渡江，陳嬰、黥布皆屬。
cells.translation: 六。梁渡江，陳嬰、黥布皆屬。
二

cells.content: 六。景駒使公孫慶讓齊，誅慶。
cells.translation: 六。景駒使公孫慶讓齊，誅慶。

cells.content: 六。攻下碭，收得兵六千，與故凡九千人。
cells.translation: 六。攻下碭，收得兵六千，與故凡九千人。
六
六
三月
三
七
三
七

cells.content: 七。攻拔下邑，遂擊豐，豐不拔。聞項梁兵眾，往請擊豐。
cells.translation: 七。攻拔下邑，遂擊豐，豐不拔。聞項梁兵眾，往請擊豐。
七
七

四

cells.content: 八。梁擊殺景駒、秦嘉，遂入薛，兵十餘萬眾。
cells.translation: 八。梁擊殺景駒、秦嘉，遂入薛，兵十餘萬眾。
四
八

cells.content: 八。沛公如薛見項梁，梁益沛公卒五千，擊豐，拔之。雍齒奔魏。
cells.translation: 八。沛公如薛見項梁，梁益沛公卒五千，擊豐，拔之。雍齒奔魏。

cells.translation: 八。臨濟急，周市如齊、楚請救。
五月
九
五
九
九
九
九
九

cells.content: 楚懷王始，都盱台，故懷王孫，梁立之。
cells.translation: 楚懷王始，都盱台，故懷王孫，梁立之。

cells.content: 十。梁求楚懷王孫，得之民閒，立為楚王。
cells.translation: 十。梁求楚懷王孫，得之民閒，立為楚王。
六

cells.content: 十。儋救臨濟，章邯殺田儋。榮走東阿。
cells.translation: 十。儋救臨濟，章邯殺田儋。榮走東阿。

cells.content: 十。沛公如薛，共立楚懷王。
cells.translation: 十。沛公如薛，共立楚懷王。
十
韓王成始。
二。陳嬰為柱國。
十一。天大雨，三月不見星。
齊立田假為王，秦急圍東阿。
十一。沛公與項羽北救東阿，破秦軍濮陽，東屠城陽。

cells.content: 十一。天大雨，三月不見星。

咎弟豹走東阿。

cells.content: 十一。沛公與項羽北救東阿，破秦軍濮陽，東屠城陽。

魏豹自立為魏王，都平陽，始。
八月
三

cells.content: 十二。救東阿，破秦軍，乘勝至定陶，項梁有驕色。
cells.translation: 十二。救東阿，破秦軍，乘勝至定陶，項梁有驕色。
八

cells.content: 楚救榮，得解歸，逐田假，立儋子市為齊王，始。
cells.translation: 楚救榮，得解歸，逐田假，立儋子市為齊王，始。

cells.content: 十二。沛公與項羽西略地，斬三川守李由於雍丘。

十三。章邯破殺項梁於定陶，項羽恐，還軍彭城。
二
九月
四
十三。沛公聞項梁死，還軍，從懷王，軍於碭。

cells.content: 十三。章邯破殺項梁於定陶，項羽恐，還軍彭城。
cells.translation: 十三。章邯破殺項梁於定陶，項羽恐，還軍彭城。
十月

cells.content: 二。田假走楚，楚趨齊救趙。田榮以假故，不肯，謂「楚殺假乃出兵。」項羽怒田榮。
cells.translation: 二。田假走楚，楚趨齊救趙。田榮以假故，不肯，謂「楚殺假乃出兵。」項羽怒田榮。

cells.content: 十三。沛公聞項梁死，還軍，從懷王，軍於碭。

十一月
五。拜宋義為上將軍。
後九月。
五。拜宋義為上將軍。

cells.content: 懷王封項羽於魯，為次將，屬宋義，北救趙。
cells.translation: 懷王封項羽於魯，為次將，屬宋義，北救趙。

cells.content: 十。秦軍圍歇鉅鹿，陳餘出收兵。
cells.translation: 十。秦軍圍歇鉅鹿，陳餘出收兵。

cells.content: 四。齊將田都叛榮，往助項羽救趙。
cells.translation: 十一。章邯破邯鄲，徙其民於河內。

cells.content: 十五。攻破東郡尉及王離軍於成武南。

十五。攻破東郡尉及王離軍於成武南。
十五。使將臧荼救趙。
十一月
七。拜籍上將軍。

cells.content: 三。羽矯殺宋義，將其兵渡河救鉅鹿。
cells.translation: 三。羽矯殺宋義，將其兵渡河救鉅鹿。
Seventh month
十二月
八

cells.content: 四。大破秦軍鉅鹿下，諸侯將皆屬項羽。
cells.translation: 四。大破秦軍鉅鹿下，諸侯將皆屬項羽。
十三。楚救至，秦圍解。

cells.content: 六。故齊王建孫田安下濟北，從項羽救趙。
cells.translation: 六。故齊王建孫田安下濟北，從項羽救趙。

cells.content: 十七。（救趙）至栗，得皇訢、武蒲軍。與秦軍戰，破之。

cells.translation: Ninth

cells.content: 十四。張耳怒陳餘，棄將印去。

cells.translation: Twelfth month
Seventh

cells.content: 十九。得彭越軍昌邑，襲陳留。用酈食其策，軍得積粟。

cells.translation: Second

cells.content: 二十。攻開封，破秦將楊熊，熊走滎陽，秦斬熊以徇。

cells.translation: Fifth month
Twelfth

cells.content: 八。楚急攻章邯，章邯恐，使長史欣歸秦請兵，趙高讓之。
二十一。攻潁陽，略韓地，北絕河津。

cells.translation: Seventh
Eighth month

cells.content: 九。趙高欲誅欣，欣恐，亡走，告章邯謀叛秦。

cells.translation: Tenth month
Fifth

cells.content: 十。章邯與楚約降，未定，項羽許而擊之。
二十三。攻南陽守齮，破之陽城郭東。

cells.translation: Twelfth

cells.content: 十一。項羽與章邯期殷虛，章邯等已降，與盟，以邯為雍王。
二十四。降下南陽，封其守齮。

cells.translation: Third month

cells.content: 十二。以秦降都尉翳、長史欣為上將，將秦降軍。
二十一。趙王歇留國。陳餘亡居南皮。

cells.translation: Fifth

cells.content: 二十六。攻下嶢及藍田。以留侯策，不戰皆降。

cells.translation: Eighth month
Third

cells.content: 十四。項羽將諸侯兵四十餘萬，行略地，西至於河南。
二十三。張耳從楚西入秦。
二十七。漢元年，秦王子嬰降。沛公入破咸陽，平秦，還軍霸上，待諸侯約。
十五。從項羽略地，遂入關

cells.translation: Tenth

cells.content: 十五。羽詐阬殺秦降卒二十萬人於新安。
二十八。沛公出令三章，秦民大悅。

cells.translation: First month
Eighth

cells.content: 十六。至關中，誅秦王子嬰，屠燒咸陽。分天下，立諸侯。
十八。項羽怨榮，分齊為三國。
二十九。與項羽有纳，見之戲下，講解。羽倍約，分關中為四國。
二十九。臧荼從入，分燕為二國。

齊王田廣始。廣，榮子，橫立之。

cells.translation: Thirteenth year. Han attacked Liang, Liang surrendered.
Thirteenth year. Han attacked Chu, Chu surrendered.

cells.content: 四月。王伐楚至彭城，壞走。

cells.translation: Thirteenth year. Han attacked Dai, Dai surrendered.
Thirteenth year. Han attacked Long Xi, Long Xi surrendered.

cells.content: 六月。王入關，立太子。復如滎陽。

cells.content: 屬漢，為隴西、北地、中地郡。

Sixth month
Ninth month

cells.content: 十一。漢將韓信破殺龍且。

cells.translation: Zhao King Zhang Er beginning, Han established him.

cells.content: 二十一。漢將韓信擊殺廣。

cells.translation: Eleventh month
Belonged to Han, became commandery.
Twelfth month
Fourth year first month
Fourth year first month
First month
Fourth year first month
Qi King Han Xin beginning, Han established him.
Fifth month
Sixth month
Huainan King Ying Bu beginning, Han established him.
Eighth month
Fifth year tenth month
Fourth year first month
Second year first month
Eleventh month
Twelfth month
Qi King Han Xin moved to Chu king.
Belonged to Han, became Nan commandery.

cells.content: 十二。徙王楚，屬漢，為四郡。
正月。。殺項籍，天下平，諸侯臣屬漢。
cells.translation: First month. Killed Xiang Yu, realm pacified, feudal lords became Han subjects.
Restored Liang state.

cells.content: 四。韓王信徙王代，都馬邑。

cells.translation: Divided Linjiang as Changsha state.
Belonged to Huainan state.

cells.content: 二月。甲午，王更號，即皇帝位於定陶。

cells.translation: Liang King Peng Yue beginning.

cells.content: 衡山王吳芮為為長沙王。
cells.translation: Hengshan King Wu Rui became Changsha king.
Third month
Fourth month
Fifth month
Second year first month
Seventh month
Zhao King Zhang Ao beginning, Er's son.
Changsha Cheng King Chen Shi beginning, Rui's son.

cells.content: 九。王得故項羽將鍾離辚，斬之以聞。

cells.translation: Ninth month
After ninth month.
Yan King Lu Wan beginning, Han Grand Tutor.
Fifth year first month
